songs.title: Trust In Me
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Trust in me, just in me
Close your eyes and trust in me
You can sleep safe and sound
Knowing I am around

[Chorus]
Slip into silent slumber
Sail on a silver mist
Slowly and surely your senses
Will cease to resist

Trust in me, just in me
Close your eyes and trust in me

[Bridge]
Trust in me, just in me
Close your eyes and trust in me

[Chorus]
Slip into silent slumber
Sail on a silver mist
Slowly and surely your senses
Will cease to resist

Trust in me, just in me
Close your eyes and trust in me
